Toilet: The toilets on this floor are straight ahead and to the left.
Lift: The lifts for Wings B and C are behind me to the left. The lifts for Wing A are straight ahead and to the left, near the other entrance.
Lift Wing A: The lifts for Wing A are straight ahead and to the left, near the other entrance.
Lift Wing B: The lifts for Wing B are right behind me to the left.
Lift Wing C: The lifts for Wing C are right behind me to the left.
Reception Desk: The reception desk is straight behind me to the left.
Stairs: The stairs to the first and second is straight ahead to the right.
Escalator: The escalator to the second floor is behind me to the left.
Nursing: The nursing room is on the 3rd floor of Wing B, in room 25. The lifts for Wing B are right behind me.
Hospital: The hospital is not here. Go straight ahead and exit through the other entrance onto the main street. Then go left on the street, and you will find the hospital in about 200 meters.
Cafeteria: The cafeteria is on this floor, straight ahead.
Coffee machine: The closest coffee machine is on the 1st floor, take the stairs to the 1st floor and turn right.
Printer: The closest printer is on the 1st floor, take the stairs to the 1st floor and turn right.
Cinema: There are 9 theaters, located on the ground, 2nd, and 4th floors of Wing C. The lifts for Wing C are right behind me.
Theater 1: Theater 1 is on this floor, to the left of the escalator.
Theater 2: Theater 2 is on this floor, to the left of the escalator.
Theater 3: Theater 3 is located on the second floor, right next to the escalator. You can either take the stairs or the escalator to reach there.
Theater 4: Theater 4 is located on the second floor, Wing C. You may use the stairs or take the lifts for Wing B to reach there.
Theater 5: Theater 5 is located on the second floor, Wing C. You may use the stairs or take the lifts for Wing B to reach there.
Theater 6: Theater 6 is located on the fourth floor, Wing C. You may use the stairs or take the lifts for Wing Bee to reach there.
Theater 7: Theater 7 is located on the fourth floor, Wing C. You may use the stairs or take the lifts for Wing B to reach there.
Theater 8: Theater 8 is located on the fourth floor, Wing C. You may use the stairs or take the lifts for Wing B to reach there.
Theater 9: Theater 9 is located on the fourth floor, Wing C. You may use the stairs or take the lifts for Wing Bee to reach there.
Study: There are several study areas on the 1st to 6th floors of Wings A and B. Take either the lifts right behind me or those straight ahead and to the left, near the other entrance.
Computer science: The Computer Science departments are on Wing A's 10th, 11th, and 12th floors,. The lifts for Wing A are straight ahead and to the left, near the other entrance.
Marketing: The Marketing and Communication department is at the 7th floor, Wing A
SAIL AI Lab: The SAIL Lab is on the 11th floor, Wing A. The lifts for Wing A are straight ahead and to the left, near the other entrance.
Mathematics: The Mathematics department is on the 9th floor of Wing A. The lifts for Wing A are straight ahead and to the left, near the other entrance.
Environmental study: The Institute for Environmental Studies is on the 8th floor of Wing A. The lifts for Wing A are straight ahead and to the left, near the other entrance.
Study area - silent: Silent study areas are located at 1st floor-Wing A, 2nd floor-Wing B, 3rd floor-Wing B, and 5th floor-Wing A.
Study area - group work: Study areas for group work are located on the 2nd floor - Wing B and 4th floor-Wing B.
Balcony: The balcony in on the 1st floor, Wing A
Meeting rooms (Foyer): Meeting rooms are located on the second floor, Wing A
Network Institute Tech Labs: The Tech lab is at room 7B37
Physical Computing Education Lab: The Physical Computing lab is at room 7B17
Hardware/Multipurpose Lab: The Hardware labs is at room 7B57 and 7B63
Rialto/Griffoen Office: The offices are located at room 7A01
Beta Common room: The Beta common room is at room 3A25
VU Education Lab: The education lab is at room 1A07
Car parking: The parking garage is below this building. Take the other exit straight behind me onto the main street. Then go through the door on the left.
Bike storage: Take the other exit straight behind me onto the main street. Turn right and take the stairs leading to the bike garage below.
MF building: Exit towards campus square and go right, see the map for more details.
Transitorium: Take the other exit straight behind me onto the main street and go left.
WN Building: Take the exit right behind me, go straight, and you will find an entrance to the WN building towards the left.
Main building: Either exit towards campus square and it is the second building on the left, or take the exit to the main street and go right.
Tent: Exit towards campus square, turn left, and cross the campus square.
Bellevue: Exit towards campus square, Bellevue can be found next to the main building.
Basketball court: Exit towards campus square and turn left. You will be looking towards the Basketball court.
Beach Volleyball court: Exit towards campus square and turn left. You will be looking towards the Beach Volleyball court.
O2: Take the other exit straight behind me onto the main street, the O2 building can be found across the street.
Acta: Take the other exit straight behind me onto the main street, the ACTA building can be found across the street.
Botanical garden: Take the exit right behind me and cross the street at the MF building. The botanical garden can be found on the other side.
OZW: You can use both exits, the OZW building is the oval building next to this one. See the map for more details.
Gym: The Gym is located on the ground floor of the OZW building. the OZW building is the oval building next to this one, you can use either exit to reach there.
Spar: The Spar store is located at campus square close to the basketball court. Take the exit right behind me, walk straight ahead, and then turn left.
VU Bus stop: Take the other exit straight behind me onto the main street, and turn right. The bus stop should be visible.
VU tram stop: Take the other exit straight behind me onto the main street, and turn right. The tram stop should be visible, behind the bus stop
Zuid Station (bus, tram, metro, and trai: The Zuid station is one kilometer away. Exit onto the main street, turn right, and then turn left at the traffic light.
Grocery store: The nearest grocery store is Albert Hein To Go, 350 meters away. Take the other exit straight behind me onto the main street, and then turn left.
IT Desk: The IT desk is located on the ground floor of the Main Building.
Security Desk: The security desk is located at -1 level of the Main Building.
Student Desk: The student desk is located at the ground floor of the Main Building.
VU Bookstore: The VU Bookstore is located at the ground floor of the Main Building.
Library: The Library is located at the Main Building.
